Class CareerCenterStaffController

java.lang.Object
src.controller.CareerCenterStaffController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthController, IReportGenerator
public class CareerCenterStaffController extends Object implements AuthController, IReportGenerator
Controller used by career center staff to perform administrative actions.

Responsibilities include authenticating staff, managing company approvals, reviewing and approving internships, handling student withdrawal requests, and generating internship reports.

      public boolean updatePassword(String oldPW, String newPW)
      Updates the password for the currently authenticated staff user.
      Specified by:
      updatePassword in interface AuthController
      Parameters:
      oldPW - existing password to verify
      newPW - new password to set when verification succeeds
      Returns:
      true if password was updated, false otherwise

    • authoriseCompany

      public boolean authoriseCompany(String companyRepId)
      Authorises (approves) a company representative by id.
      Parameters:
      companyRepId - id of the company representative to approve
      Returns:
      true if the representative was found and approved, false otherwise

    • rejectCompany

      public boolean rejectCompany(String companyRepId)
      Rejects (removes) a company representative by id. Note: the current implementation removes the representative from the data store rather than setting an explicit REJECTED state.
      Parameters:
      companyRepId - id of the company representative to remove
      Returns:
      true if the representative was found and removed, false otherwise

    • getPendingInternships

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getPendingWithdrawals

      public List<InternshipApplication> getPendingWithdrawals()
      Returns a list of internship applications for which students have requested withdrawal and the withdrawal is pending review.
      Returns:
      list of pending `InternshipApplication` withdrawal requests

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(InternshipApplication app)
      Approves a student's withdrawal request for a given application.

      This will set the withdrawal status to APPROVED, remove the application from the data store, and remove the application from the student's applied list.

      Parameters:
      app - the `InternshipApplication` representing the withdrawal
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was pending and is now approved, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(InternshipApplication app)
      Rejects a student's withdrawal request for a given application.
      Parameters:
      app - the `InternshipApplication` representing the withdrawal
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was pending and is now rejected, false otherwise

    • generateReport

      public List<Internship> generateReport(ReportCriteria criteria)
      Generates a report of internships according to the provided criteria.
      Specified by:
      generateReport in interface IReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      criteria - the `ReportCriteria` used to filter and sort internships
      Returns:
      list of internships matching the criteria

    • printReport

      public void printReport(List<Internship> internships)
      Prints a simple textual report to standard output for the provided internships.

      internships - list of internships to print
